page.title: 07AN EIGHT YEAR OLD'S DAY (2)
page.content: {A typical Saturday} On Saturday morning I get up at 7 o'clock and I get ready for swimming at 8 o'clock. When I come home I watch {The Wide Awake Club}and some cartoons} and then I watch{73.}At 11 o'clock we watch{Chips}and that's on for an hour and a quarter and then we watch{World {of Sport.}At 2 o'clock we go to our friends' house for an hour. Then we go home and watch the rest of{World of {Sport.}My hobby is doing freestyling on my BMX bike. I can pull wheelies that go straight up in the air. At 5 or 6 o'clock I go to play with Jamie till 8 or 8.30. When I get back at 9 o'clock I watch some TV for an hour and then I get ready for bed. My Mum gets me my drink and it takes me quarter of an hour to drink that. I go to bed and I read for an hour and it takes me another hour to get to sleep.
